title: Pet names, burner phones and a fast food chain: the global insider trading ring that has rocked banks
text:
A London couple who use the pet names "Pops" and "Popsy" might sound unlikely candidates for an international criminal conspiracy.

And on the surface, Benjamin Taylor and Dariana Windsor lived highly-paid but relatively ordinary lives as investment bankers.

But behind this facade the duo are accused of being key players in one of the most high-profile insider trading cases in the history of financial markets – an alleged scandal of secret messages and vast rewards spanning continents.

US prosecutors this week released explosive court documents that they say expose a "large-scale, international insider trading ring" involving the couple, who are said to have received more than $1m (£780,000) worth...
description: A London couple who use the pet names "Pops" and "Popsy" might sound unlikely candidates for an international criminal conspiracy.
